description:
Valentine`s Day rolls in... with unexpected results for almost everyone. Next, it`s already time for Sara to graduate. And could Grasshopper the Savior finally be about to catch their big break?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Valentine in Gifu / Densetsu no Hajimari / Hime to Sotsugyoushiki / Densetsu no Owari / Henjin no Salad Bowl
Valentine`s in Gifu / The Legend Begins / The Princess Graduates / The Legend Ends / A Salad Bowl of Eccentrics
バレンタイン IN 岐阜 / 伝説の始まり / 姫と卒業式 / 伝説の終わり / 変人のサラダボウル
